CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Twitter"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Instagram"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Facebook"), NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, "Direct message")) ) ), Response_Time_Minutes__c >= 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 15 ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email"), Response_Time_Minutes__c >= 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 60 ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Facebook"), CONTAINS(Subject, "Direct message"), Response_Time_Minutes__c >= 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 2 ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Apple App Store"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Play Store"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "YouTube") ), Response_Time_Minutes__c >= 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 1440 ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Achieve response time v3
